content: TEST: [2025, Age 22] Just got back from Japan, and I'm buzzing with ideas for VR/AR in blockchain. The way they seamlessly blend technology with tradition there has me thinking - what if we could create immersive experiences that not only entertain but also educate and connect communities globally? Grateful for the inspiration, now to bring it to life in NYC.", type='text')]

TEST: [2025, Age 22] Finally cracked the code for a blockchain-based VR/AR experience that lets users walk through historical events as if they were there. The challenge was ensuring real-time interaction without lag, but we did it. Now I wish I'd had this tech back in high school history class, would've made those lessons unforgettable.", type='text')]
